subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Ivan Ljubicic beat Andy Roddick, 7-6 (7-3), 7-6 (7-5), to win the BNP Paribas Open, finally claiming his first A.T.P. Masters 1000 title after three losses in finals.
snippet: Ivan Ljubicic beat Andy Roddick, 7-6 (7-3), 7-6 (7-5), to win the BNP Paribas Open, finally claiming his first A.T.P. Masters 1000 title after three losses in finals.
